title: Stage Lv8-C6-S36
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I would be most grateful if you could spare a few moments of your valuable time.
Might I venture to suggest that perhaps we could consider an alternative approach?
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 귀하의 소중한 시간을 잠시 할애해 주신다면 대단히 감사하겠습니다.
sentences.en: I would be most grateful if you could spare a few moments of your valuable time.

sentences.kr: 감히 대안적 접근법을 고려해볼 수 있을까 제안드려도 될까요?
sentences.en: Might I venture to suggest that perhaps we could consider an alternative approach?

sentences.kr: 이 권고를 드리는 것이 주제넘다고 생각하지 않으시기를 바랍니다.
sentences.en: I do hope you will not think me presumptuous in offering this recommendation.

sentences.kr: 귀하의 고견을 듣는 영광을 누릴 수 있다면 무한히 감사하겠습니다.
sentences.en: It would be an immense honor to have the privilege of hearing your esteemed opinion.

sentences.kr: 이 작은 요청이 귀하께 불편을 끼치지 않기를 간절히 바랍니다.
sentences.en: I sincerely hope this modest request will not cause you any inconvenience whatsoever.

sentences.kr: 귀하의 깊은 지혜와 경험을 조금이나마 나누어 주신다면 영광일 것입니다.
sentences.en: It would be a privilege if you could share even a fraction of your profound wisdom and experience.

sentences.kr: 감히 귀하의 귀중한 조언을 구할 수 있는 기회를 얻을 수 있을까요?
sentences.en: Might I have the opportunity to humbly seek your invaluable guidance?

sentences.kr: 이 제안이 귀하의 높은 기준에 부합하기를 간절히 희망합니다.
sentences.en: I earnestly hope this proposal will meet with your distinguished approval.
